disableAnimationDescription: Disable the background animation to improve performance and save battery life
disableHiddenDescription: This will disable the hidden play feature, and will open the Spotify app directly. Use this if you are having trouble playing the song.
multipleQRCodesDetected: Multiple QR codes detected. Please scan only one QR code at a time.
pushNotificationDescription: Welcome to QRSong, the free QR music card scanner. Enable push notifications to stay in the loop on exclusive discounts, early access to new features, and playlist ideas!
linkRetrievalError: Unable to retrieve the Spotify link!
cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera access the QRSong! app settings.
spotifyNotDetected: Spotify could not be detected on your device. If you think this is a mistake, you can still try to play the song.

helpModal.title: About QRSong!
helpModal.description: QRSong! is an app that brings your favorite songs to life through our QR music cards. You can generate your own QR cards based on your Spotify playlists at our website: https://www.qrsong.io. With QRSong!, you can play all kinds of music trivia games - if you can think of it, you can play it!
helpModal.step2: Give us the URL of your Spotify playlist, or select one from our curated lists.
helpModal.step3: Give us your address and we'll send you the cards. Or you can order a digital download which you can assemble yourself directly!
helpModal.step4: Open the QRSong! app and scan your cards
helpModal.step5: Let the music guessing fun begin!
helpModal.funWay: It's a fun and interactive way to share music with friends and family. Perfect for parties, gifts, or just adding a musical touch to your day!
helpModal.wantMore: Want more QRSong! cards? Visit our website to explore our collection and create your own custom musical experiences.
helpModal.getReady: Get ready for an exciting musical journey! Scan your QRSong cards and challenge your friends to guess the song, artist, or genre. The possibilities are endless!
helpModal.triviaDescription: With QRSong!, you can play all kinds of music trivia games. If you can think of it, you can play it! Here are some ideas:
helpModal.imagination: Let your imagination run wild and create your own unique music games with QRSong! cards.
